sqlMap.insert: /* SRMJON0010.insertCounselInfo */ INSERT INTO SSUIF ( HOUSE_CODE , SHIPPER_TYPE , IRS_NO , SEQ , SELLER_NAME_LOC , AGREE_DATE , AGREE_FILE_VER , IP_ADDRESS , ADD_DATE , ADD_USER_ID , AGREE_TYPE ) VALUES (#houseCode# , #shipperType# , #irsNo# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM SSUIF WHERE HOUSE_CODE = #houseCode# AND IRS_NO = #irsNo#) , #sellerNameLoc# , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) , #agreeFileVer# , #ipAddress# , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) , #irsNo# , #agreeType# )
